title: Cupping Therapy Basics: What to Know
excerpt: Learn how cupping works, what those marks mean, and when it helps most.
author: Dr. Huang
contentMarkdown:
Cupping uses gentle suction to improve circulation and release muscle tension.

## Common Uses

- Neck and shoulder tightness
- Back pain and stiffness
- Recovery from workouts

## What About the Marks?

The circular marks are temporary and indicate increased blood flow. They usually fade within a few days.
